item.title: Geopositional Deltas Expressed As Meters
item.description: Algorithm to achieve 1m of displacement as Degrees of Latitude and Longitude North/South Deltas: This conversion is static no matter where you are on earth => 1Lat = 110.574km 1Lat = 110574m 1m = 0.00000904371732957115 Lat therefore a delta can be calculated by the following algorithm: const METERS_TO_LATITUDE = 0.00000904371732957115 const latitudeDelta = meters => meters * METERS_TO_LATITUDE East/West Deltas This is not as straight forward. Degrees of Longitude (Lon) have to be calculated based on positioning on Earth.
